command: while true; do echo one $(date); sleep 10; done
containers.name: daemonset-container-one

command: while true; do echo two $(date); sleep 10; done
containers.name: daemonset-container-two

command: while true; do >&2 echo stderr: $(date); echo stdout: $(date); sleep 10; done
containers.name: logger

containers.name: logger

containers.name: hello
